item.title: The domain name "Dot World" is now in the sunrise period for Chinese, Japanese, and Korean languages
item.description:
Stable Tone’s DotWorld_IDN Registry has started the sunrise period for its Chinese, Japanese, and Korean top-level domain (TLD). This period, ending on November 10, 2015, allows trademark holders with prior rights to register DotWorld_IDN domain names before the public launch. Starting November 17, 2015, anyone can register these domains on a first-come, first-served basis. The two-character domain extension, 世界, translates to “world” in all three languages (pronounced “shijie” in Chinese, “seikai” in Japanese, and “segye” in Korean)...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-domain-name-dot-world-is-now-in-the-sunrise-period-for-chinese-japanese-and-korean-languages/

item.title: First and business class customers on Emirates can now enjoy a new Japanese menu
item.description:
Source: Emirates. A sample dish from the new Japanese menu. Emirates now offers a specialized Japanese menu to its first and business class passengers traveling between Dubai and Haneda, Narita, and Kansai airports in Japan. The airline’s Dubai catering team partnered with a Japanese culinary provider to develop the dishes using the highest quality ingredients. In addition to their international menu, first-class passengers can enjoy traditional kaiseki, a multi-course Japanese meal, while those in business class have the option of a bento box...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/first-and-business-class-customers-on-emirates-can-now-enjoy-a-new-japanese-menu/

item.title: Exclusive Mie menus featured at Japan Food Town this December
item.description:
Japan Food Town is celebrating a “Mie Prefecture Fair” from December 1st to 7th, 2016, showcasing special menus from over 13 restaurants using ingredients from Mie Prefecture, such as Matsusaka wagyu beef, Ise-ebi lobster, and fresh oysters. During this limited-time event, visitors can enjoy dishes made with top-grade A4 Matsusaka beef. This highly prized beef, exclusive to Japan Food Town in Singapore, comes from Special Grade Matsusaka Cattle raised in Mie Prefecture under the strict standards of the Matsusaka Cattle Council...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/exclusive-mie-menus-featured-at-japan-food-town-this-december/
